rooms.description: Large entrance hall with a foyer and coat closet, designed to welcome guests and align with Vastu principles for auspicious entry.
Open-plan living room that doubles as a family gathering space. Decorative elements inspired by Bohemian style with vibrant colors and eclectic art installations.
Cozy dining area adjacent to the kitchen for a seamless flow during meals. Vastu oriented for social interactions.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities and open layout complemented by Bohemian decorative accents.
Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony designed for relaxation. The placement is aligned with Vastu's cardinal directions for optimal energy flow.
Master en-suite bathroom adjoining the master bedroom for convenience and privacy.
Comfortable guest room with an adjacent small bathroom. Designed to provide a warm welcome for visitors.
Intimate library space with built-in bookshelves and comfortable seating. Decorated in Bohemian style with rich textures and vibrant colors.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned to receive auspicious energy according to Vastu.
Back door for kitchen and utility access, maintaining privacy while ensuring smooth flow.

additional_features.description: A rectangular swimming pool designed with Bohemian aesthetics. Positioned to maximize sunlight and integrate with the landscape.
A spacious rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, furnished with eclectic outdoor seating and decorative elements that complement the Bohemian style.
